author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Normally you expect Fedora to experiment with things before they're ready but this time Ubuntu is trying out uutils and possibly swapping to them come the next version an all rust rewrite of the GNU core utils.

title: Ubuntu Experiments With All Rust Core Utils!!
